name: Waking Nightmare
description: You target a creature within a short (10 unit) distance and trap them in a terrifying illusion. The target must make a resilience check of 10 or become Afraid. While you maintain concentration, the target takes 8 psychic damage at the start of each of their turns while they remain Afraid. If the target recovers from the Afraid condition, the spell ends on them.
charge: The required resilience check to avoid the spell is increased to 12, and the Afraid condition requires a resilience check of 12 to recover from instead of the normal amount.
